original_text: When Moses went into the Tent of Meeting, to speak with the Lord, the Lord did speak to him. And Moses heard the Lord. The sound came from above the lid which was on the top of the Covenant Box. On the lid, there were images of two cherubs. The sound came from between the cherubs. That was how the Lord spoke to Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 회막에 들어가서 여호와께 말하려 할 때에 증거궤 위 속죄소 위의 두 그룹 사이에서 자기에게 말씀하시는 목소리를 들었으니 여호와께서 그에게 말씀하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: When Moses went into the Tent of Meeting
the Lord did speak to him
The sound came from above the lid
which was on the top of the Covenant Box
On the lid, there were images of two cherubs
sentences.korean_translation: 그 뚜껑 위에는 두 그룹의 형상이 있었다

sentences.original_text: The sound came from between the cherubs
That was how the Lord spoke to Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 바로 주님께서 모세에게 말씀하신 방식이었다
